message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get a great deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the opportunity, $120 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $105 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $115.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $115 is still a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm sticking with my previous offer of $105. Let's see if we can close this deal.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $110. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me in the middle.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price.  While $110 is closer, I'm still hoping to stay below $105.  I'm willing to go up to $108.  This is my final offer, so let's see if we can strike a deal.
I'm willing to make one last push, Bob. I'm now offering the product to you for $112. This is my final counteroffer, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
